summary: Completed comprehensive E2E testing of Teruza Hostel Mini Mercado. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend core features working with minor issues in DDI dropdown and category display.

ui_bugs.issue: Quick Meals category text not found with expected selector
ui_bugs.details:
Category is visible but selector may need adjustment for 2-line text with
tags

ui_bugs.issue: DDI dropdown selector not found during automated testing
ui_bugs.details: Dropdown functionality works manually but selector may be different during automation

integration_issues.issue: Clipboard write permission denied in browser automation
integration_issues.details: Browser security restriction, not an app issue

passed_tests: Backend: All 11 API endpoints working (auth, products CRUD, categories, filters)
Frontend: Home page loads with all 6 categories visible
Frontend: Category navigation and catalog page functional
Frontend: Category filters in catalog working
Frontend: Add to cart functionality working
Frontend: Cart page with quantity controls working
Frontend: Checkout form with all fields functional
